Edges-Ledgendary -- Female Human Legendary Rogue
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (22 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d12
Fighting: (agi) d12 Riding: (agi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d12
Languages: Common; Ignan; Terran
Skill Notes:
Expert (Thievery): Increased Professional effects
Professional (Thievery): +2 Thievery step
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Master (Thievery): Uses d10 for Thievery Wild Die
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: None
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 16; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (10 points): Expert (Thievery); Followers; Master (Thievery); Master Of Arms; Professional (Thievery); Rogue; Sidekick; Tough As Nails; Tougher Than Nails; Weapon Master Hindrances: Jealous; Pacifist+; Stubborn Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Rogue: Has Armor Restriction and Sneak Attack features
Followers: Has 5 soldier followers
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
Sidekick: Has special bond with companion
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 10 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d8+d4 R3"); Guisarme (d8+d6); Spiked Chain (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +6 Parry
Master Of Arms: Increased Weapon Master effects
Tougher Than Nails: Increased Tough As Nails effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Weapon Master: +2 Parry/+d10 damage on melee attack Raise
Pacifist+: Will not fight living creatures, uses nonlethal methods only in defense
Sneak Attack: Successful attack with The Drop or on Vulnerable foe inflicts +d6 damage
Tough As Nails: Takes 5 wounds before incapacitated
